XScuWdt Struct Reference

#include <xscuwdt.h>

List of all members.

Detailed Description

The XScuWdt driver instance data. The user is required to allocate a variable of this type for every watchdog/timer device in the system. A pointer to a variable of this type is then passed to the driver API functions.


Public Attributes

XScuWdt_Config Config
u32 IsReady
u32 IsStarted

Device watchdog timer is running
